quoteText: We are not responsible for the products and services provided by such third parties.
title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "We may also offer special promotional plans, memberships, or services, including offerings of third-party products and services in conjunction with or through the Spotify Service. We are not responsible for the products and services provided by such third parties."
